title: Messages "Pop on screen" notifications would not disable
content: Since the new update, I cant seem to disable the "pop up on screen" for message notifications. It worked before, but now no matter how many times I try to disable the pop up function, it won't apply. It's annoying to see messages or notifications while I'm watching a video or doing something else on my phone. Please help!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
